address: Xã Thuận Quý, Huyện Hàm Thuận Nam, Tỉnh Bình Thuận
thought:
**Analysis of Address Mapping: Xã Thuận Quí, Huyện Hàm Thuận Nam, Tỉnh Bình Thuận**

My analysis begins with the provided address, "Xã Thuận Quí, Huyện Hàm Thuận Nam, Tỉnh Bình Thuận." The immediate task is to map this to its current administrative units. First, I identify the old province as "Tỉnh Bình Thuận" and the old ward as "Xã Thuận Quí" within the district of "Huyện Hàm Thuận Nam."  The directive to "eliminate all districts" is noted, which sharpens my focus on province and ward transformations.

I started by consulting the province resolutions, specifically 60-NQ/TW, to understand any province-level changes. Resolution 60-NQ/TW states that "Tỉnh Bình Thuận" has merged with other provinces to form "Tỉnh Lâm Đồng." This establishes "Tỉnh Lâm Đồng" as the new province.

Next, I focused on resolutions concerning ward-level changes, particularly 1671/NQ-UBTVQH15, to find how "Xã Thuận Quí" has been re-assigned.  The resolution title, "Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Lâm Đồng," aligns with the newly formed "Tỉnh Lâm Đồng." Scanning the document, line 61 caught my eye: it describes the merger of "Xã Thuận Quý" (a slight variation of "Xã Thuận Quí," which I assume is intended) with other wards into a new "Xã Tân Thành."  This line explicitly mentioned the ward in question, which is critical.

I then consulted the "New wards" dataset to confirm the details. It lists "Xã Tân Thành" with the correct ward code and within "Tỉnh Lâm Đồng," precisely as the resolution indicates.  This confirms the validity of the mapping.

Considering other lines in the resolution was also important to ensure this was the best match. Specifically, line 62 described the formation of "Xã Hàm Thuận Nam." However, "Xã Thuận Quí" was not included in this merger, making "Xã Tân Thành" the appropriate match.

Thus, the analysis culminates in a high-confidence mapping: old province "Tỉnh Bình Thuận" (now part of "Tỉnh Lâm Đồng" based on the province-level resolution) and old ward "Xã Thuận Quí" are mapped to the new ward "Xã Tân Thành" in "Tỉnh Lâm Đồng." The detailed citation from 1671/NQ-UBTVQH15 further supports this determination.

citation.header: 1671/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Lâm Đồng
citation.line: 61. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của các xã Tân Thành (huyện Hàm Thuận Nam), Thuận Quý và Tân Thuận thành xã mới có tên gọi là xã Tân Thành.
